container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Required* Must be 2-63 lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start or end with a hyphen.

algo.title: Algorithm
algo.description: Required* Mining algorithm to use (e.g., AUTOLYKOS2, ETCHASH, KAWPOW). See lolMiner docs for full list.

pool_url.title: Pool URL
pool_url.description: Required* Mining pool URL with protocol. Format: stratum+tcp://pool.example.com:port or stratum+ssl://pool.example.com:port

wallet.title: Wallet Address
wallet.description: Required* Your wallet address for the coin you're mining

worker_name.title: Worker Name
worker_name.description: Optional worker name. If not provided, uses the Salad machine ID.

extra_args.title: Extra Arguments
extra_args.description: Optional additional command-line arguments for lolMiner
